title: The Coiffure (La Toilette)
medium: drypoint, soft ground etching and color aquatint on laid paper
provenance_text:
Mary Cassatt [1844-1926]. Roger Marx [1859-1913], Paris, France (Lugt 2229), until 1913? [1]. Possibly sold at Hotel Drouot, Paris, France, April 28, 1914, no. 299 [2]. Frederick Keppel & Company, New York, NY, until September 12,1919; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, September 1919. 

Notes:
[1].  Roger Marx collector's stamp (l.r., recto.)
[2]. See "Catalogue des Estampes Modernes Composant la Collection Roger Marx." Sale took place from April 27, 1914 until May 2, 1914. Lot 299, "La Toilette," consisted of two impressions of the work.
